replies.body: Like, I wouldn't hate you for putting milk first, it just doesn't make much sense to me. The cereal is the substance so you measure out how much you want to eat. Putting milk first means you have to match the cereal amount to the milk amount, or have a really unbalanced bowl of breakfast soup.
in what universe did this question come from?

> [{quoted}](name=hokyabox,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=aGYEUGRE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-08T08:01:25.290+0000)
>
> in what universe did this question come from?

One where the OP is high as a kite
Milk 1st? Who would not see it as a bad idea...Lets talk about it.
